a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: GDP per capita in international and market dollars, India, 1960 to 2020
International dollars use purchase power parity conversion rates from 2017, in order to account for differences in
prices levels. Market dollars use currency market exchange rates.
Source: Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank, World Bank and OECD
